text: Blackthorne may refer to: *Blackthorne, video game from Blizzard Entertainment *Blackthorne Publishing, comic book publisher *Blackthorne (band), American rock group *John Blackthorne, main character of the novel Shōgun and the later miniseries adaptation of it *Paul Blackthorne, British actor ==See also== *Blackthorn (disambiguation) Category:Disambiguation pages with surname-holder lists
title: Blackthorne (disambiguation)
